title: Google\Cloud\Run\V2\CreateJobRequest
name: CreateJobRequest
description:
Request message for creating a Job.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.run.v2.CreateJobRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.parent
params.description: Required. The location and project in which this Job should be created. Format: projects/{project}/locations/{location}, where {project} can be project id or number.

params.name: data.job_id
params.description: Required. The unique identifier for the Job. The name of the job becomes {parent}/jobs/{job_id}.

params.name: data.validate_only
params.description: Indicates that the request should be validated and default values populated, without persisting the request or creating any resources.
